CustomField.formula: IF(LEN(Apttus_QPConfig__PriceListId__c) > 0, IF(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM', IF(($Profile.Name != "System Administrator" && NOT($Permission.PricingManager) && NOT($Permission.PartnerSalesManager)), IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c==0,("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIPartner" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c), IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c>0 && NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c==0,("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIWithDOD" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c), IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c>0 && NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c>0,("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIWithDODDPD" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c),null))), IF(($Profile.Name = "System Administrator" || $Permission.PricingManager || $Permission.PartnerSalesManager),("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUI" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c),null)), IF(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'PRM' && IsCollaborationProgress__c = false, IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c == 0,(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIPartner" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c), IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c>0 && NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c==0,(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIWithDOD" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c), IF(NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c>0,(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIWithDODDPD" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c),null))),null)),null)
CustomField.label: Configure button field
